languages.text: "Блюстители донесли, что вас видели в этом отсеке, и я скромно счел своим долгом направиться на грузовую магистраль с сим малым воинством... Вы не могли бы любезно сдвинуться чуть правее, Ваша Светлость?"
languages.translation_comment: после куя бунтовщик бежит в нашу сторону, фактотум стреляет и убивает его.

traits.locale_text: "Блюстители донесли, что вас видели в этом отсеке, и я скромно счел своим долгом направиться на грузовую магистраль с сим малым воинством... Вы не могли бы любезно сдвинуться чуть правее, Ваша Светлость?"

languages.translation_comment: после куя бунтовщик бежит в нашу сторону, фактотум стреляет и убивает его.

languages.text: "The enforcers reported that you had been sighted in this compartment, and I humbly believed it was my duty to head for the freight line with this very modest army... Would you kindly move a little to the right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"
languages.original_text: "Блюстители донесли, что вас видели в этом отсеке, и я скромно счел своим долгом направиться на грузовую магистраль с сим малым воинством... Вы не могли бы любезно сдвинуться чуть правее, Ваша Светлость?"

traits.locale_text: "The enforcers reported that you had been sighted in this compartment, and I humbly believed it was my duty to head for the freight line with this very modest army... Would you kindly move a little to the right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

"The enforcers reported that you had been sighted in this compartment, and I humbly thought it was my duty to head for the cargo lane with this very modest army... Would you kindly move a little to the left, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}The Factotum blows the head off a twitching heretic with a precise shot and lowers his rifle,{/n} "Much obliged."

"The enforcers reported that you had been sighted in this compartment, and I humbly believed it was my duty to head for the freight line with this very modest army... Would you kindly move a little to the right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

languages.text: «Los guardias informaron de que se l{mf|e|a} había visto en este compartimento, y creí humildemente que era mi deber dirigirme a la línea de carga con este modestísimo ejército... ¿Le importaría moverse un paso a la derecha, mi{mf|lord|lady}?».
languages.original_text: "The enforcers reported that you had been sighted in this compartment, and I humbly believed it was my duty to head for the freight line with this very modest army... Would you kindly move a little to the right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: «Los guardias informaron de que se l{mf|e|a} había visto en este compartimento, y creí humildemente que era mi deber dirigirme a la línea de carga con este modestísimo ejército... ¿Le importaría moverse un paso a la derecha, mi{mf|lord|lady}?».

languages.text: 「この区画であなたが目撃されたとエンフォーサーから報告がありました。この控えめな軍隊で貨物専用レーンに向かうのが私の務めだと思っていまして…少し左に寄っていただけませんか、陛下？」
languages.original_text: "The enforcers reported that you had been sighted in this compartment, and I humbly believed it was my duty to head for the freight line with this very modest army... Would you kindly move a little to the right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: 「この区画であなたが目撃されたとエンフォーサーから報告がありました。この控えめな軍隊で貨物専用レーンに向かうのが私の務めだと思っていまして…少し左に寄っていただけませんか、陛下？」

languages.text: “执法者报告说，有人在这片区域看到过您的身影。我谦卑地认为，我有责任组织这支零零散散的小部队前往货运区域……可以请您稍微往右边让一让吗，大人？”
languages.original_text: "The enforcers reported that you had been sighted in this compartment, and I humbly believed it was my duty to head for the freight line with this very modest army... Would you kindly move a little to the right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: “执法者报告说，有人在这片区域看到过您的身影。我谦卑地认为，我有责任组织这支零零散散的小部队前往货运区域……可以请您稍微往右边让一让吗，大人？”

languages.text: "Die Enforcer haben berichtet, dass Ihr in diesem Modul gesehen wurdet, und ich war der demütigen Meinung, dass es meine Pflicht sei, mich mit dieser höchst bescheidenen Armee zur Frachtroute zu begeben ... Wärt Ihr so gütig, ein wenig nach links zu rutschen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?"
languages.original_text: "The enforcers reported that you had been sighted in this compartment, and I humbly believed it was my duty to head for the freight line with this very modest army... Would you kindly move a little to the right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Enforcer haben berichtet, dass Ihr in diesem Modul gesehen wurdet, und ich war der demütigen Meinung, dass es meine Pflicht sei, mich mit dieser höchst bescheidenen Armee zur Frachtroute zu begeben ... Wärt Ihr so gütig, ein wenig nach links zu rutschen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?"

languages.text: « Les prévôts m'avaient signalé vous avoir {mf|aperçu|aperçue} dans ce compartiment, et j'ai pensé qu'il était de mon humble devoir de me rendre vers la ligne de fret avec cette modeste armée... Auriez-vous l'amabilité de vous déplacer légèrement sur la droite, Votre Seigneurie ? »
languages.original_text: "The enforcers reported that you had been sighted in this compartment, and I humbly believed it was my duty to head for the freight line with this very modest army... Would you kindly move a little to the right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: « Les prévôts m'avaient signalé vous avoir {mf|aperçu|aperçue} dans ce compartiment, et j'ai pensé qu'il était de mon humble devoir de me rendre vers la ligne de fret avec cette modeste armée... Auriez-vous l'amabilité de vous déplacer légèrement sur la droite, Votre Seigneurie ? »

languages.text: "İnfazcılar, bu kompartımanda görüldüğünüzü bildirdi. Ben de haddim olmayarak bu mütevazı orduyla birlikte yük hattına gitmeyi kendime vazife biçtim... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, rica etsem biraz sağa kayabilir misiniz?"
languages.original_text: "The enforcers reported that you had been sighted in this compartment, and I humbly believed it was my duty to head for the freight line with this very modest army... Would you kindly move a little to the right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"
